bibl.title: The Bearers of Business Letters in Roman Egypt
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Parameters of letter delivery. - 3. Structure of communication in business letters. - 4. Various roles of the bearer. - 5. General conclusion. - 6. Appendix 1: P.Prag. 1.111 revisited. - 7. Appendix 2: proposed corrections to papyri. - 8. Bibliography. - 9. Indices.
bibl.seg: Paul Schubert, The Bearers of Business Letters in Roman Egypt = Papyrologica Bruxellensia. 41.
Bruxelles, Association Égyptologique Reine Élisabeth (Diffusion: Peeters, Leuven - Paris, Bristol, CT), 2021, viii-64 pp. ISBN 978-90-429-4730-6. €25.

1. Introduction. - 2. Parameters of letter delivery. - 3. Structure of communication in business letters. - 4. Various roles of the bearer. - 5. General conclusion. - 6. Appendix 1: P.Prag. 1.111 revisited. - 7. Appendix 2: proposed corrections to papyri. - 8. Bibliography. - 9. Indices.
